description: Updates a package for use with Amazon OpenSearch Service domains. For more information, see Custom packages for Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: PackageID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the package.

parameters.name: PackageSource
parameters.description: Amazon S3 bucket and key for the package. S3BucketName (string) --- The name of the Amazon S3 bucket containing the package. S3Key (string) --- Key (file name) of the package.

nested_params.name: S3BucketName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket containing the package.

parameters.name: PackageConfiguration
parameters.description: The updated configuration details for a package. The license requirements for the package. LicenseFilepath (string) --- The relative file path for the license associated with the package. The configuration requirements for the package. RequiresRestartForConfigurationUpdate (boolean) --- This indicates whether a B/G deployment is required for updating the configuration that the plugin is prerequisite for.

nested_params.name: LicenseRequirement
nested_params.description: The license requirements for the package.

nested_params.name: LicenseFilepath
nested_params.description: The relative file path for the license associated with the package.

nested_params.name: ConfigurationRequirement
nested_params.description: The configuration requirements for the package.

nested_params.name: RequiresRestartForConfigurationUpdate
nested_params.description: This indicates whether a B/G deployment is required for updating the configuration that the plugin is prerequisite for.

parameters.name: PackageEncryptionOptions
parameters.description: Encryption options for a package. KmsKeyIdentifier (string) --- KMS key ID for encrypting the package. Whether encryption is enabled for the package.

nested_params.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_params.description: KMS key ID for encrypting the package.

nested_params.name: EncryptionEnabled
nested_params.description: Whether encryption is enabled for the package.

nested_items.name: PackageDetails
nested_items.description: Information about a package.

nested_items.name: PackageID
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the package.

nested_items.name: PackageName
nested_items.description: The user-specified name of the package.

nested_items.name: PackageType
nested_items.description: The type of package.

nested_items.name: PackageDescription
nested_items.description: User-specified description of the package.

nested_items.name: PackageStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the package. The available options are AVAILABLE, COPYING, COPY_FAILED, VALIDATNG, VALIDATION_FAILED, DELETING, and DELETE_FAILED.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the package was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Date and time when the package was last updated.

nested_items.name: AvailablePackageVersion
nested_items.description: The package version.

nested_items.name: ErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Additional information if the package is in an error state. Null otherwise.

nested_items.name: ErrorType
nested_items.description: The type of error that occurred.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing the error.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Version of OpenSearch or Elasticsearch, in the format Elasticsearch_X.Y or OpenSearch_X.Y. Defaults to the latest version of OpenSearch.

nested_items.name: AvailablePluginProperties
nested_items.description: If the package is a ZIP-PLUGIN package, additional information about plugin properties.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the plugin.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the plugin.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the plugin.

nested_items.name: ClassName
nested_items.description: The name of the class to load.

nested_items.name: UncompressedSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The uncompressed size of the plugin.

nested_items.name: AvailablePackageConfiguration
nested_items.description: This represents the available configuration parameters for the package.

nested_items.name: LicenseRequirement
nested_items.description: The license requirements for the package.

nested_items.name: LicenseFilepath
nested_items.description: The relative file path for the license associated with the package.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationRequirement
nested_items.description: The configuration requirements for the package.

nested_items.name: RequiresRestartForConfigurationUpdate
nested_items.description: This indicates whether a B/G deployment is required for updating the configuration that the plugin is prerequisite for.

nested_items.name: AllowListedUserList
nested_items.description: A list of users who are allowed to view and associate the package. This field is only visible to the owner of a package.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PackageOwner
nested_items.description: The owner of the package who is allowed to create and update a package and add users to the package scope.

nested_items.name: PackageVendingOptions
nested_items.description: Package Vending Options for a package.

nested_items.name: VendingEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the package vending feature is enabled, allowing the package to be used by other users.

nested_items.name: PackageEncryptionOptions
nested_items.description: Encryption options for a package.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: KMS key ID for encrypting the package.

nested_items.name: EncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether encryption is enabled for the package.
